name: Sunken Sword
description:
Sunken Sword

A short game in which you can strike fish in the ocean. You wield a bloodthirsty sword that will drain your health each time you use it. There are a total of 10 waves and three different types of enemies. Post your highscores and clear times in the comment section!

Created in one day for the mini Jam. 

Controls

[Arrows] Dash movement.

[X] Target strike dash.
